thread.title: `Pall-bearer` Jim Carrey farewells late ex-girlfriend with touching tribute
thread.title_full: `Pall-bearer` Jim Carrey farewells late ex-girlfriend with touching tribute

author: NewsWire
title: `Pall-bearer` Jim Carrey farewells late ex-girlfriend with touching tribute
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Washington D.C., Oct. 11 (ANI): Heartbroken Jim Carrey flew to Ireland for the last rights and the funeral of his late former girlfriend Cathriona White. 
Wearing a black suit and tie, the 53-year-old helped bear the coffin along with five relatives of Cathorina at Our Lady of Fatima Church in the tiny village of Cappawhite in Tiperrary, News.com.au reports. 
Carrey was seen consoling White’s sister, Lisa, outside the church as hundreds of family and friends gathered at the memorial service. 
The actor also took to his Twitter page to express his grief by posting a picture with Cathriona, in which they are looking at each other, and captioning it “Love cannot be lost.” 
It is said that the ‘Dumb and Dumber’ actor was very generous to White and took good care of her. 
White committed suicide just a few days after Carrey broke up with her. (ANI) Related Posts
